means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯特赖克职业名称，打铁工匠，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“抚摩，抹平”(to stroke,smooth)+er

sentence.Network_en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentence.Network_cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentence.Network_en: The striker was unable to find his scoring touch.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个前锋找不到进球的感觉。

sentence.Network_en: They showed little sign of equalising the Portsmouth striker's glorious 55th-minute shot.
sentence.Network_cn: 丝毫没有迹象表明他们会追平朴次茅斯队前锋在第55分钟时的精彩进球。

entry.def: In football and some other team sports, a striker is a player who mainly attacks and scores goals, rather than defends.

example.ex: ...and the England striker scored his sixth goal of the season.
example.tran: 这名英格兰队前锋踢进了他在本赛季的第 6 个进球

means.word_mean: 1. a forward on a soccer team
2. someone receiving intensive training for a naval technical rating
3. an employee on strike against an employer
5. the part of a mechanical device that strikes something

auth_sentence.content: More still are expecting, according to the striker.
auth_sentence.res_content: More still are expecting, according to the striker.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More still are expecting, according to the striker.

auth_sentence.content: The United defender was clearly preoccupied by the striker.
auth_sentence.res_content: The United defender was clearly preoccupied by the striker.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The United defender was clearly preoccupied by the striker.

auth_sentence.content: You can see why Walcott fancies himself as a striker.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can see why Walcott fancies himself as a striker.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can see why Walcott fancies himself as a striker.

sentences.en: A deputation of 40 strikers was organized.
sentences.cn: 由40 名罢工者组成了一个代表团。

sentences.en: Confronted by the angry strikers,the police had to retreat.
sentences.cn: 面对愤怒的罢工者,警察只好后退。

sentences.en: Opinion at the grassroots level is sympathetic to the strikers.
sentences.cn: 基层的意见是同情罢工者。

sentences.en: The lorry had been blacked by strikers and could not be unloaded.
sentences.cn: 那辆货车遭到罢工者抵制而无法卸货。

sentences.en: It was the deadly striker’s 11th goal of the season.
sentences.cn: 这是那个杀手前锋本赛季的第11个进球。

sentences.en: The new striker failed to make an immediate impression on the team.
sentences.cn: 新的足球前锋没能立即为球队发挥作用。

sentences.en: Our striker got into a good position to shoot,but then missed his kick.
sentences.cn: 我们的前锋取得一个有利的位置射门,可惜没有射中。
